subject: Alcohol Abuse
Football
Handicapped
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati Bengals linebacker Odell Thurman says that the N.F.L.’s decision not to reinstate him because officials believe he is an alcoholic violates the Americans with Disabilities Act.
snippet: Cincinnati Bengals linebacker Odell Thurman says that the N.F.L.’s decision not to reinstate him because officials believe he is an alcoholic violates the Americans with Disabilities Act.
